properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT FAQ_NO , TITLE , REPLY , CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_TYPE , REF_NO , COUNT FROM FAQ JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_TYPE , REF_NO FROM FAQ_CATEGORY
INSERT INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , TITLE , REPLY , CATEGORY_NO , MANAGER_NO , COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_CATEGORY_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , 1 , DEFAULT )
